name: Sector 7G (Resonantmango)
description:
Talk to all sorts of unique characters on interesting planets. This is a pure exploration game with unique character physics (each planet gravitationally pulls you to its grasp as you fly around the solar system). Land on a planet and talk to everyone you can see in your quest to find all 9 of Ol' Willer's shoes!

-------------------------------------------------------

(All play-testers beat the game in around 20 minutes.)

-------------------------------------------------------

The web version is provided, but it seemed a little buggy....

We recommend downloading a build as everything works as intended there. 

-------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look

Shift - Sprint

Space - Jump (Not available at start)

F - Interact

U - Toggle Fullscreen

Esc - Toggle Mouse Focus

-------------------------------------------------------

This is our humble first entry in a game jam. Connor did all the art/animation, Chris did all the coding and SFX.

Built in Godot 3.2.1

-------------------------------------------------------

Thanks to all our playtesters: 

Olivia, Anthony, Tomas, Rafael, Addison, Bigman (a.k.a. Scary Boggles a.k.a. Sufferer of Bigmania)
